programme.title: Live ATP Masters Tennis
programme.desc: The Rogers Cup. Coverage of day two from Aviva Centre in Toronto, featuring the conclusion of the first round and the opening second-round matches. The top eight seeds enter the competition in round two, and four of those players failed to progress to the next stage in Montreal last year, with Stan Wawrinka retiring hurt and Tomas Berdych, Marin Cilic and MIlos Raonic all losing their matches. Eventual champion Andy Murray had no such problems as he defeated Tommy Robredo in straight sets.(n)
